name: Mike Tanchuk
title: I am a Full-Stack Developer
about_text1: Hello! I'm a Trainee Full Stack Developer with approximately five years of non-commercial experience in development. Over this time, I have honed my coding skills and built a strong foundation in software development.
about_text2: In the past year, I have been immersing myself in web development, an exciting and dynamic field that I am deeply passionate about. I am currently focusing on mastering React for front-end development and Node.js for back-end, as I believe these technologies are pivotal in modern full stack development.
about_text3: Moreover, I have a B2 English proficiency level, which means I'm equipped with the language skills needed to work effectively in professional environments, comprehend technical documentation, and collaborate in a global team.
about_text4: My dedication to learning, coupled with my hands-on experience, makes me ready to tackle any challenges. I am committed to continuous growth, always eager to learn more and push the boundaries of what I can achieve as a developer.
about_text5: Feel free to explore my portfolio, and do not hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions. I am always looking forward to new opportunities and collaborations.
education_text1: Bachelor, National Taras Shevchenko University of Kyiv, Kyiv
education_text2: Enrolled into Faculty of Computer Science and Cybernetics Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv. Relevant coursework in Web Development, Software Engineering, and Database Systems.
